name: Forcing Accountability and Exposure
description: Revealing PSN corruption and holding them publicly accountable.

cards.title: Strategic Document Leaks
cards.description: Leveraging internal information leaks to dismantle PSN credibility.
bulletpoints: Gathering verifiable evidence before initiating exposure.
Releasing damning information in controlled phases for maximum impact.
Using legal loopholes to ensure whistleblower protection and safety.

cards.title: Legal Action and Investigative Traps
cards.description: Triggering legal mechanisms to entangle PSNs in accountability measures.
bulletpoints: Utilizing forensic accounting to uncover financial fraud and corruption.
Coordinating with investigators to expose organized criminal connections.
Creating situations where PSNs incriminate themselves publicly.

cards.title: Controlled Media Exposure
cards.description: Using media and public perception as a tool for dismantling PSN control.
bulletpoints: Employing investigative journalism to reveal hidden truths.
Launching public campaigns to shift narratives away from PSN propaganda.
Utilizing decentralized platforms to bypass censorship attempts.
